Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Tenzi vako (Iwe Muhammad (SAW)) havana kukurasirira kana kukuvenga
Uye zvirokwazvo hupenyu hwemangwana hwakanaka kwauri kukunda hupenyu hwenyika ino
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako vachakupa (zvakanaka) naizvozvo ugofara
Havana here kukuwana (Muhammad (SAW)) uri nherera ndokubva vakuchengetedza
Uye vakakuwana uri murombo ndokubva vakuita mupfumi (mugutsikani nezvaunazvo)
Uyezve taura pamusoro pemakomborero aTenzi vako (awakapiwa, Huporofita nemamwewo)
